name: Real Man Got 100 |  是男人上100层
detailed_description:
REAL MAN can go up to 100 floors!
Do you dare to play?

It's a game of strategy & act & difficult, leisure and comedy.
At the same time, this mini-sadistic game
Perhaps in the near future, through painstaking practice
You will become a real man!

In the game, you just need to click the left mouse button to suffer smoothly.
With the efforts of our development team, we have not succeeded in men!
It's really hard to get 100 floors.

There are 21 lovely characters in the game waiting for you to unlock them.
Game Support List You can compete with your friends!
The game supports cloud archiving!
This is a leisure and entertainment dessert! If you like to torture yourself! Don't miss it!

short_description: It's a game of strategy & act & difficult, leisure and comedy. Perhaps in the near future, through painstaking practice You will become a real man!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound +
